body.raw:
# Divider

## Import

```jsx live=false
import { Divider } from '@totejs/uikit';
```

## Usage

```jsx
<Divider />
```

## Divider Orientation

```jsx
<>
  <Divider orientation="horizontal" />
  <Center height="50px" mt={12}>
    <Divider orientation="vertical" />
  </Center>
</>
```

## Variants

```jsx
<>
  <Divider orientation="horizontal" variant="dashed" />
  <Center height="50px" mt={12}>
    <Divider orientation="vertical" variant="dashed" />
  </Center>
</>
```

## Props

<PropsTable
  data={[
    {
      name: 'orientation',
      required: false,
      type: 'horizontal | vertical',
      default: 'horizontal',
      desc: '',
    },
    {
      name: 'variant',
      required: false,
      type: 'solid | dashed',
      default: 'solid',
    },
  ]}
/>
